hero.subheadline: The only AI agent that self-verifies every line it writes. We don't just generate code; we prove it works before you ever see a PR.

verification.title: Self-Verification Loop
verification.desc: Automated testing and verification built into every task. If it fails, we fix it.

context.title: Deep Context Awareness
context.desc: We index your entire repository to understand your project structure and standards.

autonomy.title: Multi-Step Autonomy
autonomy.desc: From planning to PR, handle complex workflows without constant supervision.

security.title: Security & Compliance
security.desc: Every change is scanned for vulnerabilities and secrets. We ensure your code follows best practices and stays compliant with your project standards.

problem.title: Tired of "AI Slop"?
problem.description: Most AI coding tools generate code that looks right but fails in production. You spend more time debugging the AI than you would have spent writing it yourself.

step1.title: Define your task
step1.desc: Describe what you need in plain English or via CLI.

step2.title: Agent Executes
step2.desc: The agent plans, implements, and tests the solution autonomously.

step3.title: Review & Merge
step3.desc: Receive a PR with a full report and passing test logs.

beta.title: Beta Access
beta.description: We're currently in closed beta. Join now to get unlimited access to all features while we refine the future of agentic coding.

footer.description: The trustworthy agentic coding partner that takes ownership of your codebase and self-verifies every change.
